content.rendered: The hits are hard but the slap shots are harder, and with a Roadtrips fully customizable travel package, you can be in the stands for some of hockey’s most exciting events of the season. Witness some of the greatest hockey players in the world take to the ice on an outdoor rink at either the Winter or Heritage Classic, or be there for the epic conclusion of the NHL season at the Stanley Cup Final.
